posts.message:
in JQuery , hidden options in select still accessible by keyboard arrows 
how to solve this problem ?

(Hiring)
job Title: senior php developer (Team Leader)
need: 1 developer 
Location: online
Working Hours: 8 hours
Days Off: Friday
Qualifications:
- practical experience in PHP development for large-scale, web-based applications using PHP Frameworks especially with codeigniter Framework.
- Solid grounding in the fundamentals of Object-Oriented Design and design patterns.
- Front-end skills with experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and XML.
- Extensive knowledge of SQL databases - MySql is required.
- experience more than 3 years.
CVs to be sent to : php-hossam@tl4s.com (please write "senior PHP developer" in mail subject)

Juniors/seniors. please read this article.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Teach Yourself Programming in Ten Years
http://norvig.com/21-days.html

المقال مترجم للعربيه: http://myahya.org/writing/21-days/
posts.caption: norvig.com
posts.description: The conclusion is that either people are in a big rush to learn about computers, or that computers are somehow fabulously easier to learn than anything else. There are no books on how to learn Beethoven, or Quantum Physics, or even Dog Grooming in a few days. Felleisen et al. give a nod to this tren…

posts.message: Handlebars helpers now comes in Rails Flavor. My plan is to create a set of handlebars helpers that works very closely as Rails AssetTagHelper. If you start extending it please make a pull request after you finish. every single helper will have the credit of it's owner :)
